name: FireFly Less is More
description:
This is my submission for the BlackThornProd Game Jam #3 Less is More. I went with a nature type game where you are a Firefly that losses light and energy from pollinating flowers. The lower the light bar is the more points, and more bat enemies.

Hover over the question mark for controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Follow the target indicator to locate the flowers and Press and Hold "X"

Avoid the bats

The less light and energy the more score points and bats
